# authorizationStatus

**Type Property**

Your app’s authorization status for the external storage device.

## Declaration

```swift
class var authorizationStatus: AVAuthorizationStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

If the value is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAuthorizationStatus/notDetermined], you can request access by calling the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVExternalStorageDevice/requestAccess(completionHandler:)] method.
title: authorizationStatus
